Lock Changes in Birmingham

Find vetted locksmiths in Birmingham specializing in lock changes. Replacing old or compromised locks with new, secure cylinders (Euro, Mortice, or Rim).

See locksmiths offering lock Request quotes
Service Overview

What lock changes involves

Replacing old or compromised locks with new, secure cylinders (Euro, Mortice, or Rim).

  • Moved into new house
  • Key/holder change
STANDARD Priority Level

Scheduled Service

This service can usually be scheduled at your convenience. Book in advance for the best availability and pricing.

Typical pricing in Birmingham

Service Type Low Average High
Standard call-out £65 £85 £110
Parts & Labour (avg) £80 £120 £180
Emergency/Out-of-hours £95 £140 £200

*Estimates based on typical Birmingham prices. Costs may vary based on time of day, complexity, and parts required.
